name: Valkyrie Jotunheim
description:
A lost valkyrie must find her way back to the bifrost in the cold realm of Jotunheim.

If you played our game please leave a comment and take our questionnaire.

Google Forms Questionaire We greatly appreciate feedback!

This is our bachelorproject for spring 2020, and is therefore it's not a finished product. We are continuing to develop this game so please keep that in mind when playing.
